data.name: V-Skin Xsens support Pack
data.detailed_description:
After the purchase, you will get the support of the XSENS somatosensory device, and you can let the 3D characters move freely through the XSENS somatosensory device.

Note: This product does not contain XSENS somatosensory equipment. If necessary, you can contact the XSENS agent to purchase the equipment; if there is no XSENS somatosensory equipment, this DLC cannot be used normally.
data.about_the_game:
After the purchase, you will get the support of the XSENS somatosensory device, and you can let the 3D characters move freely through the XSENS somatosensory device.

Note: This product does not contain XSENS somatosensory equipment. If necessary, you can contact the XSENS agent to purchase the equipment; if there is no XSENS somatosensory equipment, this DLC cannot be used normally.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
